title: Ep. 11 - From Dusk 'til Dad
itunes:title: Ep. 11 - From Dusk 'til Dad
itunes:subtitle: The dads head to *spicy meatball hands* Roqueporte with a new, powerful ally. Darryl reconnects with his hobby, Henry declines to appropriate Darryl's culture, Glenn's instincts were dead on, and Ron kills.
description:
The dads head to spicy meatball hands Roqueporte with a new, powerful ally. Darryl reconnects with his hobby, Henry declines to appropriate Darryl's culture, Glenn's instincts were dead on, and Ron kills.


This episode contains profanity, violence, sexual content, drug/alcohol use and violence towards children.


Support the show on Patreon!

Get merch and more at our website!

Follow us on Twitter @dungeonsanddads!

Join our Facebook group!

Check out the subreddit!

Project DADGUT is the group transcription project


DM is Anthony Burch

Darryl Wilson is Matt Arnold (@mattlarnold)

Henry Oak is Will Campos (@willbcampos)

Ron Stampler is Beth May (@heybethmay)

Glenn Close is Freddie Wong (@fwong)


Theme song by Maxton Waller

Cover art by Alex Moore (@notanotheralex)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
